Articles.Content: Since .21 completely changed the mÃƒÂ¼n, what happend to the old Easter eggs, are there any new ones, and where are they?
No new ones, some of the old ones may have been moved in altitude though

I'm not aware of any new ones, hints about easter eggs usually get dropped by the devs and I don't recall it being hinted. If they were hinted, nobody picked up on it!

I think all the old easter eggs will remain in the same locations, but if their positions were not updated some of them may be left floating or buried in the ground... I'm not personally much of an easter egg hunter, so I can't really point out where any of them are.
the Neil Armstrong monument is still there.
Since we are talking about easter eggs, does anyone know for sure that the easter egg in the desert on Kerbin is buried or not.?

do you mean the pyramid complex?
